Details.Name: Shopping
Details.Feature: $5 = 10X DBS Points for online retail spend
Additional 9X DBS Points are only applicable to the first S$2,000 online retail spend every calendar month
$5 = 3X DBS Points for overseas retail spend

Details.Name: Entertainment
Details.Feature: $5 = 10X DBS Points for online retail spend
Additional 9X DBS Points are only applicable to the first S$2,000 online retail spend every calendar month
$5 = 3X DBS Points for overseas retail spend
Complimentary Access to selected True Fitness and True Yoga Centres twice a month

Details.Name: Rewards
Details.Feature: $5 = 10X DBS Points for online retail spend
Additional 9X DBS Points are only applicable to the first S$2,000 online retail spend every calendar month
$5 = 3X DBS Points for overseas retail spend

Details.Name: Card Information
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver1 year fee waiver, subsequent years waived with min. spend of $25,000 p.a.
